name: 𝕊𝕖𝕣𝕒𝕡𝕙𝕠𝕟𝕚𝕟
description:
Seraphonin is a precision platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a contagious immortality. Conquer the challenges of the Abyss and save the Afterlife!

Enjoy the fast paced gameplay reminiscent to that of Super Meat Boy, with a chunky retro pixel art style inspired by Wario Land 4 and Celeste!

Beware, this game is hard!

Features:

  • Fast fluid player movement
  • Wall jumps, double jumps, and sleep
  • Instant respawn times
  • 20 levels and a boss encounter in the base game
  • 20 challenging levels in the post-game
  • Saved progression
  • NPC dialogue

Controls:

  • Spacebar to jump
  • WASD or IJKL to move around
  • Xbox gamepad supported!

Release Date: June 21st 2022

Price: Free!

Developer: Audeus (Michael Gilbert)

Contact: mwagilbert2016@gmail.com
